item.title: ONGOING PROBLEM Poor management of roadworks signs, 29th October
item.description:
As per attached photos taken on two separate mornings…… Vehicles have been driving through this supposed ‘CLOSED ROAD’ (sic) over barriers…. Why can roads NOT be closed with signage that is PROPERLY managed? LBBromley please address this matter with both Riney and the utilities ……. Pedestrians are potentially endangered and motorists, understandably, frustrated…… Please treat this as a PRIORITY…… Raised with Councillors, do I need to raise with Mr Jones? Please advise…… Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prince Imperial Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
